channel.title: Lab 6 Grading Email :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Greetings! Here is the information you’ll need to know to get your lab graded. Grading Date/Time: <time> Contact me ASAP if that time will not work for you for any reason and I will work with you to reschedule. Zoom Link: <link> If you haven’t used Zoom before, I recommend going to https://ksu.zoom.us/ first to download the Zoom client software. Then, when the time comes, click the link above to join the Zoom session.
